questions.quote: Maybe his dogs heard about how you tried to kidnap that other dog. These muts like to gossip. So have you talked too Holly?
Oh, Jerry. I can't believe you asked me about that statue. Do you know how much trouble you could've got me into?
Well, this'll be a very interesting experiment to see if Kramer says something. You sure you wanna go through with this?
Look, you made the allegation. The least you could do is follow up.
Alright, you know what this is gonna do? He's gonna be upset because you didn't call him and we're not gonna get those tickets for Friday night.
Jerry, listen, it wasn't you. I just didn't have 'em back then.
Uh, George, your parents can't blow through their savings in this community. It's low-rent. Now, we feel that Florida is really the place where they should be.
Oh, fantastic!  It felt so good to get my hands back in taht dough.
If anyone should be forced to leave that place, it should be her!
Master of Evil Jerry Seinfeld has broke off all contacts with me.
